name: omnivore-list-popup
description: Browser extension to show a popup with a list of your Omnivore articles.
author: Sebastian Herrmann

scripts.zip-release: zip -r omnivore-list-popup-release.zip icons CHANGELOG.md LICENSE manifest.json options.css options.html options.js popup.css popup.html popup.js variables.css
scripts.zip-release-sources: zip -r omnivore-list-popup-release-sources.zip icons src .eslintignore .eslintrc.json .gitignore .nvmrc .prettierignore .prettierrc CHANGELOG.md LICENSE manifest.json options.css options.html package-lock.json package.json popup.css popup.html variables.css README.md webpack.config.js
scripts.create-release: npm run build && npm run zip-release && npm run zip-release-sources
